name: HyperlinkTextDestinations

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: add

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The text or insertion point location that the hyperlink points to.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new HyperlinkTextDestination (Optional)

methods.description: Creates a new hyperlink text destination.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the HyperlinkTextDestination.

methods.name: item

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified index or name.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The HyperlinkTextDestination, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkTextDestination, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The HyperlinkTextDestination, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkTextDestination, Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestinations within the specified range.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the HyperlinkTextDestination that follows the desired HyperlinkTextDestination.

methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the index previous to the specified index.

methods.name: nextItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The HyperlinkTextDestination whose index comes before the desired HyperlinkTextDestination.

methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination whose index follows the specified HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HyperlinkTextDestination.
Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified index.

description: A collection of hyperlink text destinations.
